titleInfo.title: Coll 29/45(3A) 'Conditions of service of personnel serving in the Persian Gulf: Major M P O'C Tandy'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 57; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns condition of service of Maurice Patrick O'Connor Tandy, leaving his post of Political Agent in Kuwait in March 1948. The file also covers arrangements for Tandy's successor.The file is composed of correspondence between the Political Residency in the Persian Gulf, Secretary of State for India, Commonwealth Relations Office, the Commonwealth Relations Department of the Government of Pakistan, the Treasury, the Political Agency at Kuwait, the Foreign Office, the British High Commissioner in Pakistan.
